name: TorontoObserver
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Welcome to The Toronto Observer. You can ask for the latest news and featured stories from East Toronto.

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing. 

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move The Toronto Observer to the top of your news brief.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
